game.name: Mr Gun Man
game.description:
In Mr. Gun, many more exciting and challenging activities are waiting for you. Join this brand new action game and get ready to wear your unique fighting shades and go on a unique and exhilarating journey that is full of obstacles! The problem is that everywhere you find nothing but a horde of deadly enemies. They would not leave you even if you make a single mistake. You need to be the most horrifying nightmare of your rivals by putting your killer looks and perfect aiming abilities to test. 

Choose from rifles and shotguns and enter the battlefield where you have to look into the eyes of your opponents with full of confidence! Your objective is to find each bad guy and kill him before he commits any wrong activity in your area. It is important to complete each level without losing your life so play this cool shooting game carefully. Keep climbing the stairs and destroying all your opponents you see on your way! Do not take your finger off your trigger otherwise you would get late to shoot your rival.

Give your target practice lessons a try to enjoy a perfect shot in this html5 shooter game! Your enemy will also take his turn if you miss your shot and, for your better knowledge, he is not going to leave you at any cost. Your level progress bar will be displayed on the top of the screen. The level boss will come into the picture once you destroy all the enemies. If you shoot him, your level progress bar will be completed and you are moved to the advanced level. Grab coins and collect bullets and steep cannons and advanced guns!!
